USER.listfeeds: !listfeeds - List all feeds for this channel.
USER.latest: !latest <feed_name> - Show the latest entry from a feed.
USER.getfeed: !getfeed <title_or_domain> - Search for a feed and display the latest entry.
USER.genfeed: !genfeed <website_url> - Generate an RSS feed for a given site via rss.app.
USER.search: !search <query> - Search for feeds matching a query.
USER.stats: !stats - Display uptime, feed counts, and subscription counts.
USER.unsub: !unsub <feed_name> - Unsubscribe from one of your private feeds.
USER.latestsub: !latestsub <feed_name> - Show the latest entry from one of your private subscriptions.
USER.admin: !admin - Show admin info. (Non-admins get partial info.)

OP.addfeed: !addfeed <feed_name> <URL> - Add an RSS feed to this channel (OP only).
OP.getadd: !getadd <title_or_domain> - Search & auto-add feed to this channel (OP only).
OP.setinterval: !setinterval <minutes> - Set the feed check interval (OP only).
OP.join: !join <#channel> <adminname> - Bot joins a channel (bot admin only).
OP.part: !part <#channel> - Make the bot leave a channel (bot admin only).

OWNER.network: !network add <name> <server/port> [-ssl] <#channel> <opName> - Create a new IRC network entry (owner only).
OWNER.set: !set irc.<name>.<field> <value> - Update a network field (e.g. sasl_user) (owner only).
OWNER.connect: !connect <networkName> - Connect to a network from networks.json (owner only).
OWNER.addnetwork: !addnetwork <networkName> <server_info> <channels> <admin> [-ssl] - Old method to add a network (owner only).
